actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that psychosis developing a 10-percent degree of disability or more within 2 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.

summary.text: Provides that an active psychosis developing a 10 percent degree of disability or more within two years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 312)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that psychosis developing a 10-percent degree of disability or more within 2 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.
